CALICE::LCGenericObjectImplCloner

CALICE::LCGenericObjectImplCloner Class Reference

Utility class to clone a LCGenericObject this is needed is needed since during the writing of CALICE conditions data a full collection has to be memorized until a new set of this datatype appears. More...

#include <LCGenericObjectImplCloner.hh>

Public Member Functions

 LCGenericObjectImplCloner (const LCGenericObject &a)

Detailed Description

Utility class to clone a LCGenericObject this is needed is needed since during the writing of CALICE conditions data a full collection has to be memorized until a new set of this datatype appears.

Author:
Götz Gaycken LLR (Ecole Polytechnique)
